main event: Multiple UFO sightings reported in New Guinea, particularly on June 26, 1959, including observations of bright lights and humanoid figures on top of the UFOs.
interesting points: Witnesses reported figures moving on top of one UFO, A detailed sketch of the UFOs was provided by witnesses, Observers noted the color-changing behavior of the lights in the sky, The object was described as moving at high speeds and making erratic maneuvers, 38 witnesses corroborated the sightings of the UFOs over several hours.
sighted object: Bright white lights and UFOs with humanoid figures
witness description: Papuan natives and missionaries, some of whom were teachers and medical assistants
